summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 9, 2019. It details staff posts, shift changes, leave statuses (including sick leave and annual leave), and overtime occurrences for correctional services staff. The document appears to be a routine administrative log for the facility.

persons.name: Thomas, M
persons.context: Listed as an officer with an OT (overtime) status noted as NC (not clear), and later inserted into a post assignment from sick/annual leave.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Staff Assignment
events.description: Routine daily assignment and shift management for correctional staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: MCC NEW YORK, NEW YORK, NY
keyFacts: This document is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for August 9, 2019.
It lists various posts and shifts (e.g., Post Split Shift, CAPTAIN, SEC OPS LT, SALLY OFF, SHU, UNIT posts) and tracks staff status changes including sick leave, annual leave, and overtime.
Only one individual, Officer Thomas, M, is explicitly named; all other personnel are referred to by role or post number.
The document reflects standard prison administrative operations, showing no direct mention of Jeffrey Epstein or case-related activities.
The roster indicates a total of 116 Correctional Services Staff and 8 Non-Correctional Services Staff were scheduled, with 28 overtime occurrences.
